content:
FILE_WRITTEN:.github/workflows/ci.yml
DIR_STATE:[".github/workflows/ci.yml", ".github/workflows/qa-gate.yml"]
SUMMARY: Added a first-gate smoke-test CI job that builds and runs the docker-compose smoke service and always uploads the persisted out/ log bundle before longer jobs run.
